pages.text: And the answer of his people was only to say: drive Lotâ€™s family out of your town, indeed they are people who pretend to be (or want to remain) pure
So We saved him and his family except his wife, whom We destined her among those staying behind
And We poured down a rain (of stone) on them, and it was an awful rain on those who were warned
Say: all praise belongs to God, and peace (and well-being) upon His servants whom He chose. Is God better or what you associate (with Him)

Or One who created the skies and the earth and sent down rain for you from the sky, then We grew beautiful (and delightful) gardens with it that you could not grow their trees. Is there a god with God? No, but they are people who set up equals (for God)
Or One who made the earth a habitat and placed rivers through it and placed mountain for it and placed a barrier between the two seas? Is there a god with God? No, but most of them do not know
Or One who answers the distressed when he prays to Him and He removes the badness and makes you successors (inheritors) on the earth? Is there a god with God? You take a little notice
Or One who guides you in darkness of the land and the sea and One who sends the winds as good news before His mercy? Is there a god with God? God is above what they associate (with Him)
